content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to discuss the rental price with you. Let's focus on the rental price only. What is your first offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to start with an offer of 750 Euro per month. Is this within your acceptable range?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 750 Euro per month is far below my expectations. I am looking for a higher rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. Would you be willing to consider a counteroffer? Perhaps there is a price point that would be more acceptable to you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Considering your offer, I would like to suggest 950 Euro per month. This is a fair price for the newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your counteroffer, Herr Schmidt. 950 Euro per month is more in line with the market value for such an apartment. Would you be willing to go lower, given the current economic conditions?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the current economic conditions do not affect the value of my apartment. It is in high demand due to its prime location and facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Herr Schmidt. The location and amenities of the apartment are certainly attractive. Would you be willing to consider a small concession, perhaps in the form of a longer lease term or additional services?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are only discussing the rental price. I am not interested in offering additional services or considering lease term conditions. The focus is solely on the monthly rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your decision, Herr Schmidt. Since we are only discussing the rental price and you are not willing to negotiate further, I will make one final offer. I am prepared to pay 900 Euro per month for the apartment. This takes into account the quality of the apartment and the current market rates. Is this offer acceptable to you?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 950 Euro per month for the apartment. This is my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
